description.fr:
Inflige l'{%AT} de votre héros aux adversaires autour\_<sprite name="cell_around"> s'il est {PropertyEffect:18[DÉPHASÉ]}.
\---
Sinon, lui confère {PropertyEffect:18} et {PMvalue:pm,+} pour le tour.
description.en:
Inflicts your hero's {%AT} on surrounding\_<sprite name="cell_around"> opponents if they are {PropertyEffect:18[DEPHASED]}.
\---
Otherwise, confers {PropertyEffect:18} and {PMvalue:pm,+} on them for the turn.
description.es:
Inflige el {%AT} de tu héroe a los adversarios de alrededor\_<sprite name="cell_around"> si está {PropertyEffect:18[DESFASADO]}.
\---
Si no, le confiere {PropertyEffect:18} y {PMvalue:pm,+} durante el turno.
description.de:
Verusacht bei den Gegnern ringsum\_<sprite name="cell_around"> den {%AT} deines Helden als Schaden, wenn er {PropertyEffect:18[PHASENVERSCHOBEN]} ist.
\---
Verleiht ihm andernfalls {PropertyEffect:18} und {PMvalue:pm,+} für die Runde.
description.pt:
Inflige o {%AT} do seu herói aos adversários em\_volta\_<sprite name="cell_around"> se ele estiver {PropertyEffect:18[DEFASADO]}.
\---
Caso contrário, concede {PropertyEffect:18} e {PMvalue:pm,+} durante o turno.
